# Spin Redeem

This script allows your viewers to redeem a special reward on your Twitch channel that spins any model in VTube Studio. It's a fun and interactive way to engage with your audience and add some flair to your stream. Don't forget to scream during the spin!

## Features

- The script triggers a spin animation for your current model in VTube Studio.
- Optionally, a beep sound can be played to enhance the effect (note: the beep sound file must be provided separately due to licensing restrictions).
- The rotation is reset after the script finishes.

## Installation

1. Open Streamer.bot
2. Click Import
3. Copy-paste the string below:
```text

```
4. Enjoy :)
